name: Cosmic Dodge
overview: Published in the book "Winning Games on the Commodore 64" and the German version titled "Das große Commodore-64-Spiele-Buch". In Cosmic Dodge you are aboard a space freighter which has no forms of offense or defensive weaponry. You are heading straight into a swam of bird-like creatures which will not attack you, but may very well bump into you and inadvertently destroy you. You have two options, to dodge them or use hyperspace. If you dodge them, you gain points, if you use hyperspace you do not. F1 to hyperspace and F7 to return.
